name: Jelly Poppy - Runner Games
description:
Run, Poppy, run! Have fun with Jelly Poppy - Runner: Running New Games 2020. Run your tiny feet off, complete challenging levels and unlock amazing sceneries.

You may choose among three super cute characters - Jelly Poppy, Rabby the Rabbit, Polly the Chicken. Enjoy endless runs in the jelly running games. In this run game you have to watch your step - avoid obstacles and collect coins. And be careful not to fall over the edge.

Every level brings a new, unique and fun experience. One of the best free games Jelly Poppy - Runner: Running New Games 2020 will occupy your time and make you not want to put down your phone.

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jellyrunner.poppy

Download on AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/jelly-poppy-running-games/id1531442096
